meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2734.

td.p: Anita Cohen, an editor and science writer from Brookhaven Hamlet, New York
Mark Lambert, a publisher's assistant from Seattle, Washington
Mary Hirschfeld, a professor of economics originally from Pullman, Washington (whose 3-day cash winnings total $41,403)

tr.td: THE BODY BOVINE
STREETS
SPORTS
COSMETICS & PERFUME
PEOPLE IN HISTORY
SHADES
(Alex: Shades of colors.)
